description: Erection of a part double part single storey rear extension. Front and rear dormer roof extension and installation of 5x rear and 5x front roof lights to facilitate loft conversion. Conversion of existing garage into habitable room and erection of a new single attached garage to front of the property and removal of existing chimneys.
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposal would not cause harm to trees that are protected by Tree Preservation Orders. As such, the proposal would have a detrimental impact upon the character and appearance of the area, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2019) and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy (2012).
The Environmental Protection Officer (Air Quality) reviewed the application and is not able to recommend discharge of Condition  5 (Details of Boilers) due to insufficient information being provided.

The description in the application form shows 'Demolition of no. 113 Tolworth Rise North', where as the submitted demolition and proposed site plan does not show demolition of 113 Tolworth Rise North. Please clarify and amend the application form and other documents as required
